metadata.title: CVE-2016-10074 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The mail transport (aka Swift_Transport_MailTransport) in Swift Mailer before 5.4.5 might allow remote attackers to pass extra parameters to the mail command and consequently execute arbitrary code via a \" (backslash double quote) in a crafted e-mail address in the (1) From, (2) ReturnPath, or (3) Sender header.

criterions.comment: libphp-swiftmailer package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.2-1.1').
